snippet.title: Twist of Destiny Steam Greenlight Trailer
snippet.description:
The Official Steam Greenlight trailer. In the video you can see the footage of the current game Demo. 😋
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=828223205

http://gamejolt.com/games/twist-of-destiny/222215
👉_____________________________________________________________👈
Twist of Destiny is an exciting turn-based RPG where you lead a team of up to 4 characters around the world in dangerous adventures! Experience the astonishing art & animations in the world of TOD.
